Articles.Content:
this Is my modlist

KSPIE

Beyond Home

Planetary Domes

EPL

KW rocketry

IFS

my docking ports will not release even when I click undock it disappears and the ships stay connected any fixes you have?
Any chance the docking ports are actually surface attached somewhere else and not just docked?

If you have a savegame from just before the two ships docked, it might help the devs to track down this bug. I know they are interested in finding out all the different ways it can happen.

However, to fix that, you really need to use a persistence file editor tool. KML, for example, has specific code in it to fix this exact docking problem.
